page.title: 16 JOE FAGG OF KENNINGTON
page.content: Fagg's Fleet transports second-hand equipment. The company was formed in 1942. Joe Fagg started the business because he was a manager of a building merchants. There is no apparent successor for the company. The company's overheads are high and the company covers {ENGLAND.}There have been no offers to buy the company. Joe Fagg employs 30 staff, 11 of which are full-time. His wife is the director of the company. Joe Fagg started to donate money in 1979 and he was Chairman of {ASHFORD {CHILDREN'S DAY.}Joe Fagg will continue to donate money for as long as he can. There are not many charities that he does not give money to. He thinks the{ {DOMESDAY PROJECT}is a good idea but the name has associations with death!
